item.description:
Since i had to cancel this event on Saturday the 2nd of June I am reposting this event. I just hope the weather is good?

Bring your own food, to grill if you dont like burgers and hot dogs. I will have music, and hope we can dance ! outside. Or bring music you want to dance too I have I pod hook up and you can bring CD's as well.

Salads, cooked ready to eat items will be fine.. bring your beverage of choice and lets mingle and have some fun, I need it !!

Sorry i have not had much going on hope getting together will change things for all?

Claire

Bring chairs, I have a Firepit, For some smor's later in the evening? IF anyone has some tiki torches let me know, or a canapy to put up.. I have a table but could use another?

It is a dead end street so park on street, I want to ave driveway open for dancing? Parking should not be a problem???

Claire

Oh please let me know what you will bring?

good to not have duplicates write in your rsvp status OK!!

This meetup will not allow to bring guest. I dont mind guest but would rather members be allowed to attend before someone brings friends who are not members? If you care to bring a guest waiting until all members have rsvp first okay.

this meetup fills quickly so sign up soon???
item.how_to_find_us: GPS, or i will send directions

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Cookout and campfire at my house (pot luck)
